quoteText: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes to our information practices. If we make any material changes we will provide notice on this website, and we may notify you by email (sent to the e-mail address specified in your account), prior to the change becoming effective. We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest information on our privacy practices. If you continue to use the Services after those changes are in effect, you agree to the revised policy.
title: Terms may change without warning and at their sole discretion

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: LastPass may change its Privacy Statement and Terms of Service at their sole discretion. LastPass expects visitors to frequently check the website for any changes to their Privacy Statement and Terms. Your continued use of or access to the Website following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.
